profile.description: Passionate about software development and technology, I am characterized by my constant pursuit of challenges and my commitment to professional growth. I find motivation in exploring the vast technological landscape, always seeking new knowledge to enrich my career. In my free time, I compete online in chess, a game that stimulates my strategic ability, and I exercise in the gym to maintain a balance between mind and body. Football is also part of my recreational activities, providing me with moments of disconnection and fun.

data_experience.title: Backend Developer
data_experience.description: Led the creation of a comprehensive module that allowed efficient control of all company assets, providing a complete view and detailed history. Developed REST API services that enhanced efficient communication between various parts of the system, facilitating integration and improving interoperability.

data_experience.title: Frontend Developer
data_experience.description: Contributed to the development and design of high-quality mobile applications for clients using modern frontend technologies. Conducted thorough interface testing to identify and address usability and visualization issues.

data.title: TrendCinema - Discover the Latest Trending Movies
data.description: Mobile applications that provide you access to the latest and most popular movies of the moment.

data.title: TaskFlow - Organize Your Tasks with Ease
data.description: TaskFlow is an intuitive application designed to help you manage your daily tasks efficiently. With an easy-to-use interface, you can create, organize, and complete your tasks in seconds.
